channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Deployer Framework Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Deployer Framework Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-36889|2024-08-03T10:14:29.368Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20deployer%20framework%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Deployer Framework Plugin 85.v1d1888e8c021 and earlier does not restrict the application path of the applications when configuring a deployment, allowing attackers with Item/Configure permission to upload arbitrary files from the Jenkins controller file system to the selected service.

item.title: CVE-2022-36891|2024-08-03T10:14:29.393Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20deployer%20framework%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins Deployer Framework Plugin 85.v1d1888e8c021 and earlier allows attackers with Item/Read permission but without Deploy Now/Deploy permission to read deployment logs.

item.title: CVE-2022-36890|2024-08-03T10:14:29.478Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20deployer%20framework%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Deployer Framework Plugin 85.v1d1888e8c021 and earlier does not restrict the name of files in methods implementing form validation, allowing attackers with Item/Read permission to check for the existence of an attacker-specified file path on the Jenkins controller file system.
